content: Police installation in Singapore 1°17′42.41″N 103°48′01.76″E﻿ / ﻿1.2951139°N 103.8004889°E﻿ / 1.2951139; 103.8004889 **Queensway Base** is the police installation that is home to the [Special Operations Command](/wiki/Special_Operations_Command_(Singapore)) (SOC), a front line department within the [Singapore Police Force](/wiki/Singapore_Police_Force) (SPF). It is situated directly across Queensway, and was formerly the [Old Queenstown Police Station](/wiki/Singapore_Police_Force#Defunct_Units/Facilities). Units such as the [Police Tactical Unit](/wiki/Police_Tactical_Unit_(Singapore)), [Special Tactics and Rescue](/wiki/Special_Tactics_and_Rescue_(Singapore)) (STAR) unit, [Crisis Negotiation Unit](/wiki/Singapore_Police_Force_Crisis_Negotiation_Unit) (CNU), [K-9 Unit](/wiki/Police_K-9_Unit_(Singapore)) and some SOC units are located here.[*citation needed*] - List of contact information Archived 2007-09-28 at the [Wayback Machine](/wiki/Wayback_Machine) This [law enforcement](/wiki/Outline_of_law_enforcement)–related article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e This Singaporean organisation article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e
title: Queensway Base
